funding-group.funding-statement: Research funding was provided by Sanofi Pasteur. The funder also provided support in the form of salaries for authors (JN and RD), but did not have any additional role in the study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript. The specific roles of these authors are articulated in the ‘author contributions’ section. All authors had full access to the data in the study and take responsibility for the integrity of the data and accuracy of its analysis.
